title: NIA Denoise: User-Friendly AI Denoising Plugin for ImageJ/Fiji (v{{VERSION}})
description:
NIA Denoise (Neural Inference Assistant) v{{VERSION}} is a standalone ImageJ/Fiji plugin that brings Deep Learning-based image denoising to bioimage analysis without the headache of configuring Python environments.

v{{VERSION}} Release Highlights:
NIA Denoise bridges the gap between advanced AI algorithms and daily lab routines:

  • ðŸš€ Zero Python Required: Powered by ONNX Runtime (Java). No need to install Conda, PyTorch, or TensorFlow. Just download and run.
  • ðŸ§  Built-in DnCNN Model: Comes with a pre-trained DnCNN (Denoising Convolutional Neural Network) model ready for immediate use on fluorescence microscopy data.
  • ðŸ”Œ Custom Model Support: Advanced users can load their own .onnx models (e.g., for segmentation or super-resolution) directly through the GUI.
  • âš¡ Batch & Multidimensional: Automatically handles Z-Stacks, Time-lapse, and Multi-channel images with real-time progress feedback.

Key Features:

  • User-Friendly GUI: Simple Swing-based interface with model selection and status monitoring.
  • Smart Normalization: Automatic image normalization and contrast enhancement post-processing.
  • Hardware Acceleration: Utilizes basic CPU optimizations for stable performance on standard lab computers.
